timeline.message:
Remove public getPermissionSubscriptionState

* Replace getPermissionSubscriptionState with getDeviceState
* Add isEmaiSubscribed method to OSDeviceState
* Delete OSPermissionSubscriptionState class

timeline.bodyText: Consent isn't needed since this is just a getter, it doesn't make any network requests
